column1: ee uatabola utabola lemati la koloi
ke ka mona uchobelang ke ka mona
ke koloi yaka ena ha se lebokose
ha le yo lebokose lahao mona
ke lena laka leatsamaya leya natala
hothwe enngwe eisa bana kliniking ha bakena ka mane
etlabua jwalo ka wena ntho ee
nna bana baka kebatsetse ka lebokoseng bana baka
pepa ntho eno ntho ena epepile yane eatsamaya
hothwe dikoloi dipepile bana ba rona
ba kae bayang kliniking batheoha ntate bamatha
jowe batho baamatha baya kliniking ntate
hothwe ngwana emonyane ohatsetse ngwana emonyane ohatsetse
hothwe ngwana emonyane okena ka mokoting
kekenya dintho ka koloi e sosopiri
jwale mmutlanyana oneotswere tau moholo ka mohatla
ere mmutlanyana otsware tau moholo ka mohatla
echo jwalo mmutlanyana otswere tau moholo
ha kere uetse tsomo wena ure barenere
